song.englishname: In The Name Of The Lord

english.segment1: In the name of the Lord. In the name of God. We shall overcome. In the name of the Lord. In the name of the Lord. In the name of God. We have been released. In the name of the Lord
english.segment2: . Verse 1: Healing to the nations. Salvation to the ends of the earth. Proclaim deliverance for His Kingdom comes. In the name of the Lord
english.segment3: . Verse 2: Righteousness and honour. The glory of the sons of God. Overcoming and victorious. In the name of the Lord
